 Artificial Intelligence (AI) in NSW Planning Solutions Panel: Site specific documentation support
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=F67135FD-B57C-1122-14DB203F66062232
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=F67135FD-B57C-1122-14DB203F66062232
 Invalid Date
 This RFP proposes to supplement the existing Artificial Intelligence (AI) Solutions Panel by selecting additional AI Solution that address a new use case 5 to be included on the panel. 
The objective of this RFP is to supplement the existing AI Solutions Panel by the addition of proposed AI solutions that are market-ready, high quality and mature AI products that address site specific documentation support for applicants and council staff.

 Salesforce CRM Marketing Cloud Managed Services
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=5E2021C6-C21C-4927-905009F4B9F3D947
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=5E2021C6-C21C-4927-905009F4B9F3D947
 Invalid Date
 ID Support NSW is looking for a Managed Service provider that can help with Salesforce CRM, Telephony, and Marketing Cloud maintenance and support, also supporting ongoing development of ID Support NSW Salesforce strategy this will be for 1 year with 2 year optional extension.
 


 Domain-based Messaging, Authentication, Reporting and Conformance (DMARC) reporting tool for all of NSW Government
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=FDEB58D1-C999-CBB4-D05670955313C7F7
 https://www.tenders.nsw.gov.au/wsroc/?event=public.rft.show&RFTUUID=FDEB58D1-C999-CBB4-D05670955313C7F7
 Invalid Date
 In 2021, Cyber Security commenced the DMARC project, rolling out DMARC across 11 portfolios, 180 agencies and state organisations, eight state-owned corporations and 128 NSW local councils, protecting more than 21,000 NSW Government domains.
The core objective of this tender is to engage a provider that can provide a DMARC reporting platform to preventthreat actors from abusing NSW Government domains while providing insight into the traffic against these domains through a threat reporting mechanism, and related account management services to Cyber Security NSW
